title: BUG - Health Bar and Champion Shaking
body:
My health bar and champion shake for the first few minutes of a game while the camera is locked.
Does anyone know why this is and is anyone else experiencing this?

Only started this patch.
Stops when the camera is locked or I am in windowed mode.
It is still occurring after the recent hot fix patch.
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: shake? Could you elaborate on what you mean by this.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pbvmF3rP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-06T04:43:27.696+0000)
>
> shake? Could you elaborate on what you mean by this.

I think he means like stutter step, this also happens to me when I have page sizing on
